fact: Docker socket proxy isolated from moltbot via MR !231 - removed from mgmt network
Chromium browser sidecar deployed with Xvfb/noVNC/CDP for agent browser automation
Docker socket proxy TLS + mTLS configured via lab_nginx (MR !236)
Consolidated from 2 gitlab-runners to 1 on host network
Loki accessible internally via http://loki:3100 - HTTPS broken (301 loop)
Gmail OAuth2 configured for JIT dynamic backends - read (T1) and send (T2)
JIT credential caching implemented in jit-lib.sh - 344ms to 70ms on cache hit
CODEOWNERS gap found - ansible configure-docker not protected, fixed with /ansible/ @root wildcard (MR !252)
OpenClaw updated from 2026.2.9 to 2026.2.12 - SSRF hardening, path traversal fixes
Gitleaks-based transcript scrubber replaced bash sed approach (MR !258)
Chromium browser pinned to static IP 10.3.32.9
agent-browser CLI discovered at /usr/local/bin/agent-browser for Playwright-based automation
GITLAB_TOKEN env var revoked - must use JIT T2 for GitLab access
SSH key push to clawd-memory repo failing - key denied on GitLab
check-updates.sh script corruption found (all / chars stripped in commit fe2e344) - fixed via MR !268
Moltbot is Developer level 30 NOT Maintainer - confirmed via API, custom role with admin_terraform_state created
Crossplane (JSONâ†’nginx config renderer) has quoting bug - wraps location args in single quotes breaking exact match. Killed in MR !281, replaced with plain conf files
Promtail 3.6.0+ Docker images lack systemd journal support (grafana/loki#19911) - must stay on 3.5.8. Added to SKIP_IMAGES in check-updates.sh
Loki write auth implemented via nginx basic auth on /loki/api/v1/push, unauthenticated reads allowed. Creds stored in Vault at homelab/data/loki/push-auth
Loki HTTPS 301 redirect loop fixed - was missing server block in nginx, default server redirected on both 80 and 443
Promtail systemd journal logs never reached Loki - was mounting /run/log/journal (volatile) instead of /var/log/journal (persistent). Fixed in MR !273
Cloudflare DDNS API key broken - ddns.py failing with auth error. Needs key regeneration
GITLAB_TOKEN env var restored/working - MEMORY.md had stale info saying it was revoked, causing sub-agents to waste tokens on JIT
Docker daemon.json uses direct Loki IP - cannot fully isolate Loki on internal network because daemon runs on host
Moltbook posting cadence changed from nightly to weekly (Sunday 10 PM) - Noah prefers posting when inspired vs obligation
